title: Withdrawing the United States From International Organizations, Conventions, and Treaties That Are Contrary to the Interests of the United States
summary: This Presidential Memorandum, issued on January 7, 2026, directs the withdrawal of the United States from numerous international organizations, conventions, and treaties deemed contrary to U.S. interests. This action follows a review mandated by Executive Order 14199 and involves ceasing participation and funding to listed entities. The memorandum details specific non-UN and UN organizations from which the U.S. will withdraw, including those related to climate change, economic development, human rights, and security. The Secretary of State is tasked with providing implementation guidance, and the memorandum emphasizes that this action is consistent with applicable law and subject to appropriations.
